name: Jump Focus
description:
Jump Focus is an addacting free Android game where you will reach new heights by jumping from platform to platform.

Be careful though! The platforms are moving, so time your jumps correctly. Also avoid touching spikes and flying enemies.

Wait for the right moment and tap the screen to jump. Make 8 good jumps and receive an extra life!

Unlockable characters

Improve you jumping skill and unlock new characters! Each character jumps differently.

Beat your friends!

Share your high score on the online leaderboard! Impress your friends!

Features
  • Pixelated graphic design
  • Original atmospheric sound
  • Randomly generated platforms
  • One touch control
  • Unlockable characters
  • Online leaderboard
  • Statistics overview
  • Option to reset your progress and unlocks
